00086 #define _NoAcc(X) Internat::StripAccelerators(_(X))
00087 
00088 // Use this macro to wrap all filenames and pathnames that get
00089 // passed directly to a system call, like opening a file, creating
00090 // a directory, checking to see that a file exists, etc...
00091 #if defined(__WXMSW__)
00092 // Note, on Windows we don't define an OSFILENAME() to prevent accidental use.
00093 // See VerifyFilename() for an explanation.
00094 #define OSINPUT(X) Internat::VerifyFilename(X, true)
00095 #define OSOUTPUT(X) Internat::VerifyFilename(X, false)
00096 #elif defined(__WXMAC__)
00097 #define OSFILENAME(X) ((char *) (const char *)(X).fn_str())
00098 #define OSINPUT(X) OSFILENAME(X)
00099 #define OSOUTPUT(X) OSFILENAME(X)
00100 #else
00101 #define OSFILENAME(X) ((char *) (const char *)(X).mb_str())
00102 #define OSINPUT(X) OSFILENAME(X)
00103 #define OSOUTPUT(X) OSFILENAME(X)
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 // Convert C strings to wxString
00107 #define UTF8CTOWX(X) wxString((X), wxConvUTF8)
00108 #define LAT1CTOWX(X) wxString((X), wxConvISO8859_1)
00109 
00110 #endif
